text: @sardesairajdeep @PVMaiya . Yes  a lot of work is being done to meet this unprecdented challenge; Remember Covid-19 has no cure. A common resolve by a symbolic gesture or a prayer may help mitigating the stress. Not necessary to mock it. It is not mandated
